markdownRemark.html: It has been very exciting learning the in’s and out’s of HTML and CSS. It is amazing how powerful CSS can be when designing a site. I found a neat tutorial, written by the Code Player, that spotlights some of the controls CSS provides. Here’s an Android logo I built using just HTML and CSS by watching this cool video from the site.
